question:
Consider the following statements about the Aadhaar Enabled Payment System (AEPS):
  1. It is an initiative of National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI)
  2. It functions through the National Financial Switch
  3. It can be used for Interbank Mobile Payment Service (IMPS)
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
All given statements are correct
AEPS is a bank led model which allows online interoperable financial transaction at PoS (Point of Sale/Micro ATM) through the Business Correspondent.
The only inputs required for a customer to do a transaction under this scenario are:-
  • IIN (Identifying the Bank to which the customer is associated)
  • Aadhaar Number
  • Fingerprint captured during enrollment
